title: Data Center Engineer
summary: Imagine what you could do here. At Apple, new ideas have a way of becoming extraordinary products, services, and customer experiences very quickly. Bring passion and dedication to your job and there's no telling what you could accomplish. ...
description: You will help complete projects in the deployment and maintenance of compute servers, including cabling infrastructure and DCIM elements. You will provide DC incident management and change control to prevent and/or manage failure scenarios leading to the recovery of services with improvement plans to mitigate future occurrence. ...
preferred_qualifications: Must be capable of independent problem solving and self-motivated. Strong communicator at all levels with excellent oral and written skills to a variety of audiences. Prior experience in DC operations, supply chain, DC Construction would be beneficial.
